title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Design and analyze a propulsion system using the given parameters. Submit a report detailing your methodology and results.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Perform combustion analysis for various fuel types and evaluate efficiency under changing pressure conditions.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Model and simulate a rocket nozzle design in MATLAB or Python. Compare performance metrics under different flow conditions.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Short quiz on lift, drag, and flow separation. Submit answers through the online portal.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze laminar and turbulent flow over an airfoil using computational fluid dynamics.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Perform heat transfer analysis for a re-entry vehicle. Compare theoretical and simulated results.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a lightweight structural component using composite materials. Include FEA results.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital parameters for a satellite and simulate its trajectory using Python.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive exam covering spacecraft subsystems and integration principles.
